about_the_game:
What is "Bunny eShop - Desktop Pet Tuya"?

We've turned the adorable animations from the game into a desktop pet, allowing the cute bunny spirit "Tuya" to accompany you on your desktop at all times!

How to Operate?

This is a standalone application. After downloading the DLC, click on the executable file (Tuya.exe) from the installation location to launch it. Once launched, a small icon will appear in the notification area. Right-clicking on the icon allows you to switch between "Free Movement" and "Stationary" modes or close the program. The mouse scroll wheel can adjust the size of Tuya.

What Can It Do?

It can... emit cute energy to heal your soul!
Although this desktop pet don't have many practical functions at the moment, if you enjoy it, please share your thoughts~
